title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.57 - Special applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.57 - Special applications

State Regulations

All applications, including applications to
dispense with statutorily required personal appearances, period of residence of
a child, or period of waiting after filing of the adoption petition, shall be
made in writing and shall be accompanied by affidavits setting forth the
reasons for the application and all facts relevant thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
207.57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
